text: Nicola Delli Santi (born 4 April 1970) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in the team eventing at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Nicola Delli Santi
